title: The node data synchronization is abnormal, and the block is not updated
body: #### System information Erigon version: `./erigon --version` erigon version 2022.05.4-alpha-a9f3c67f OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX Linux version 4.15.0-163-generic (buildd@lcy01-amd64-021) (gcc version 7.5.0 (Ubuntu 7.5.0-3ubuntu1~18.04)) #171-Ubuntu SMP Fri Nov 5 11:55:11 UTC 2021 Server configuration: Hetzner root: Commit hash : `git branch * (HEAD detached at v2022.05.04)` #### Expected behaviour `erigon --syncmode snap --http --ws --http.addr 10.0.0.12 --http.vhosts eth.rpc.local --snap.keepblocks=true` #### Actual behaviour The node data synchronization is abnormal, and the block is not updated The following is the node log `May 19 11:27:12 Ubuntu-1804-bionic-64-minimal erigon[3982]: [WARN] [05-19|11:27:12.875] Served conn=217.12.201.45:41516 method=eth_accounts reqid=1 t=29.365µs err="the method has been deprecated: eth_accounts" May 19 11:27:15 Ubuntu-1804-bionic-64-minimal erigon[3982]: [INFO] [05-19|11:27:15.094] [p2p] GoodPeers eth66=60 May 19 11:27:16 does not exist/is not available" May 19 11:27:49 Ubuntu-1804-bionic-64-minimal erigon[3982]: [WARN] [05-19|11:27:49.556] Served conn=217.12.201.45:41534 method=eth_accounts reqid=1 t=26.39µs err="the conn=185.82.216.158:38350 method=net_version reqid=67 t=10.46µs err="the method net_version does not exist/is not available" May 19 11:29:02 Ubuntu-1804-bionic-64-minimal erigon[3982]: [WARN] [05-19|11:29:02.650] Served conn=217.12.201.45:41572 method=eth_accounts reqid=1 t=29.645µs err="the method has been deprecated: eth_accounts"` #### Steps to reproduce the behaviour #### Backtrace ```` [backtrace] ````
hi. we just released `2022.05.05-alpha` - please try, thank you

> hi. we just released `2022.05.05-alpha` - please try, thank you
I upgraded it. After restarting, I still have this problem.

> 

Sorry, I don't understand what you mean

@wetezos i'm about https://www.markdownguide.org/extended-syntax/#fenced-code-blocks

don't know reason why your sync is stuck - yet. do:
1. `make integration`
2. show `./build/bin/integration print_stages --datadir=<your_datadir>`
3. try `./build/bin/integration stage_headers --reset --datadir=<your_datadir>`, then start erigon as usual and see if it still has troubles

> @wetezos i'm about https://www.markdownguide.org/extended-syntax/#fenced-code-blocks
> 
> don't know reason why your sync is stuck - yet. do:
> 
> 1. `make integration`
> 2. show `./build/bin/integration print_stages --datadir=<your_datadir>`
> 3. try `./build/bin/integration stage_headers --reset --datadir=<your_datadir>`, then start erigon as usual and see if it still has troubles

Thanks a lot. It's ok now.
